episodes.title: Shadows Over Columbus | Inside the Xenos Cult
episodes.description:
In this bone-chilling episode of Spooky Sleuths, we delve into the shadows of a lesser-known cult, Xenos, haunting the streets of Columbus, Ohio. Join us as we uncover the eerie origins and sinister practices of this enigmatic group.
Behind closed doors, a web of manipulation and control was being spun. With every new recruit, Xenos tightened its grip, employing insidious techniques like love-bombing and isolation to ensnare the vulnerable.
As we peel back the layers of this cult, we uncover disturbing testimonies from former members, detailing psychological abuse, coercion, and even allegations of supplying underage members with substances to keep them dependent.
Join us as we navigate the labyrinthine corridors of Xenos, shining a light on the darkness within and offering resources for those seeking to escape its clutches. Don't miss this spine-tingling episode of Spooky Sleuths, where truth is stranger than fiction.


HOW TO LEAVE: 
https://www.xenosisacult.com/how-to-leave
